title: E-dairy Website
description: This project is an e-commerce website for dairy products. It include functionalities of searching products, add/remove to cart, buy now, payment gateway, admin operations, login/sign up, etc.

title: Venue Booking and Recommendation System
description: This project is web app for booking venues. It also recommend venues to the user according to his/her previous review activities. It also has platform for venue owners to showcase their venues.

title: My Portfolio
description: This project is build to showcase my portfolio. Here i have used MERN Stack to show my skills on Full-Stack Development.
